For my last post:

If you download Cheat Engine, leave everything as it is and don't change anything. Click on the icon with a computer/magnifying glass (under File) and find the program Utorrent; click on that. Only click on "Enable Speedhack" type in 0.1 and click apply. I get a shit ton of more speed with this, you can also use it for other programs like Steam to download games you bought faster.
For Steam click 0.3

Like last time, reloaded created a new directory for the savegames. Copy the files from C:UsersUsernameDocumentsTelltale GamesThe Walking Dead Episode 3 to C:UsersUsernameDocumentsTelltale GamesThe Walking Dead Episode 4 to continue your game. I know you can start directly the episode 4 anyway, but the choices you makes are probably shared between episodes.

To continue from previous games, open the Walking Dead 4 folder you just downloaded and click 'Pack'. Copy the folder 'WalkingDead104'. Go to the folder where your Walking Dead 3 game is saved (most likely C:ProgramFilesx86>The Walking Dead Episode 3). Open that folder and click 'Pack'. Paste the 
'WalkgingDead104' folder there. Click the 'WalkingDead101' application two folders up (within the Walking Dead episode 3 folder) and you should be able to continue your game.

If this still doesn't work for some reason, go to Documents>Telltale Games and copy all the files from Walking Dead Episode 3 folder into Walking Dead Episode 4 folder. This should do it.
